name: European Society of Toxicology In Vitro
goal:
ESTIV is the leading organisation in Europe that:
- Promotes in vitro and in silico toxicology scientifically and educationally.
- Encourages research and use of 3R alternative methodologies.
- Strengthen the scientific network of in vitro and in silico toxicologists.

Among the many ESTIV activities are the following:
- To organize and promote scientific workshops and congresses on a regular basis.
- To organize educational and training courses.
- To distribute regular information on in vitro and in silico toxicology events.
- To support similar organizations and societies at a worldwide level.
- To attract and integrate young scientists.
interests: Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
- Legislation regarding the protection of animals for scientific research purposes.
- Ban of the use of animals for safety evaluation of chemical compounds.
